entities.name: weasley
entities.description: The Weasleys are a family of wizards mentioned in the text. They are known for trying to send a lavatory seat to someone, which they thought would be amusing.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is a person who works as a healer in the wizarding world. She confiscates the lavatory seat because she thinks it might not be very hygienic.

entities.name: lavatory seat
entities.description: The lavatory seat is an object that the Weasleys tried to send. It was confiscated by Madam Pomfrey because of hygiene concerns.

relationships.description: The Weasleys tried to send the lavatory seat, but it was confiscated by Madam Pomfrey.
Madam Pomfrey confiscated the lavatory seat because she thought it might not be very hygienic.
